```{r}
#| label = "DataName.lm"
DataName.lm = lm(ResponseName ~ RowFactor+ColFactor+FactorName, data=DataName)
anova(DataName.lm)
```


```{r}
#| label = "plotDataName.lm",
#| fig.cap = "Residual analysis for DataName.lm"
library(ggfortify)
autoplot((DataName.lm)
```


```{GetMeans}
library(emmeans)
emmeans(DataName.lm, pairwise ~FactorName)
```
